channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Los Angeles mayor lifts downtown curfew she imposed during protests against immigration raids

item.title: While Defunding California High-Speed Rail, Don’t Forget Its Costly Northern Extension
item.description: Even if these projects made sense when first conceived, they no longer do.

item.title: Brian Wilson and the Memory of Patriotism
item.description: Recovering a music and film legacy in the age of rage.

item.title: Financial Data Reveals ‘No Kings’ Protests Are Hypocritical Astroturfing
item.description: The left’s latest bid to regain power is a clunky combination of astroturfing and gaslighting.

item.title: Texas Lawmakers Have Failed Their Constituents on Immigration Enforcement

item.title: U.S. Should Destroy Fordow — but Only If Israel Can’t
item.description: The U.S. should not pursue a regime-change war akin to Iraq, but a congressionally approved, limited operation should be on the table.

item.title: Kristi Noem is 'alert and recovering' after trip to hospital over allergic reaction, official says
item.description: U.S. Secretary of Homeland Security Kristi Noem was taken to the hospital on Tuesday after experiencing an allergic reaction, her spokeswoman said.

item.title: OnlyFans (Finally) Discovers Its Red Line
item.description: But one must ask: What makes Bonnie Blue’s stunt more appalling than others on the platform?

item.title: L.A. Riots Are A Proxy War For The Ruling Class’s Fight Against Real America
item.description: The intifada in Los Angeles, Austin, Philadelphia, New York, Boston, and even Omaha is the sequel to the summer of George Floyd.

item.title: Ivy League Researchers Scaremonger About GOP Health Policy But Say Nothing About Similar Democrat Plans
item.description: When the GOP scales back entitlements, the professoriate says legions of people will die. But when Democrats do the same thing, they're silent.

item.title: Trump's 'most magnificent poles' with U.S. flags to debut at White House
item.description: President Trump said Wednesday the White House will raise American flags on two poles he had planted as a personal gift to the nation.

item.title: E. Jean Carroll Recounts Her Trump Rape Allegations In ‘Hilarious’ New Book
item.description: E. Jean Carroll thoroughly captures the delusional, narcissistic, and devious nature of the anti-Trump left.
